snippet.title: Official Battle Cats Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Battle Cats by PONOS

Adorable kitties go wild all over the world!

Here's your chance to raise and play with them for free!

Note:

Battle Cats is completely free to play, but some items can also be purchased for real money!

*Easy&fun battle system
-Tap your any cat you like.
-Fire Cat Cannon to support them.
-Attack enemy's castle.

*Easy&fun raising system
-Clear stages to get XP.
-Tap cat to upgrade the level!
-Their form will be changed at level 10.

{Fun things in Battle Cats}
-Find treasures all over the world.
-Gross,but somehow lovely characters.
-Special cats are even cuter!

Easy system and recommended for men and women of all ages!

Start your wonderful adventure today!

Presented by PONOS

iTunes Store Page:

https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/battle-cats/id547145938?mt=8

Homepage:

http://www.ponos.co.jp/iphone/en/iphone_top.htm
